releaseNotes: Thanks for helping fight food waste with us! This app release includes bug fixes and performance improvements. Enjoy!
description:
Too Good To Go makes it easy to have a positive impact on the planet while saving money on your favourite foods. As the #1 app for reducing food waste, you can eat well while doing good by saving tasty unsold surplus food such as snacks, takeaway meals, and ingredients straight from shops, cafes, grocery stores, and restaurants in your area - all at an unbeatable price.

Food waste is a significant problem for the environment, but together, we can be part of the solution. In a world where one-third of food goes to waste annually, the Too Good To Go app is your ticket to unlocking affordable eats that help the planet.

How Too Good To Go Works:

Explore and Discover: Download the app to explore the map, finding nearby restaurants, cafes, grocery stores, and shops with tasty surplus takeaway meals, snacks, or ingredients.
Choose Your Surprise Bag: Browse a variety of Surprise Bags, each filled with tasty, surplus food. From takeaway sushi and fast-food favorites like pizzas and burgers to grocery staples and healthy fruits and veggies, the options are endless.

Affordable Rescues: Select a Surprise Bag that suits your cravings and budget. Prices start from as low as £2/2€, providing an affordable and sustainable way to enjoy quality meals.

Secure Your Spot: Confirm your purchase through the app to secure your spot and rescue these tasty takeaway treats. Your contribution not only saves you money but also actively reduces surplus food waste.

Collect and Enjoy: Head to the selected business at the pre-set time to collect your Surprise Bag. Indulge in your tasty rescued sushi, pizza, baked goods, groceries, and more guilt-free, knowing you've made a positive impact on the environment.

Why Too Good To Go?

Wallet-Friendly Indulgence: Access good-quality food at affordable prices, allowing you to eat well while doing good - satisfying both your taste buds and wallet.

Variety and Choice: Too Good To Go is partnered with local favourites and renowned brands like Costa Coffee, Greggs, Caffè Nero, Starbucks, Morrisons, and more. We offer a diverse range of tasty options for every palate, including baked goods, sushi, pizza, groceries, and more.

Environmental Impact: Every Surprise Bag equates to 2.5kg of CO2e avoided, meaning enjoying your favourite grocery or takeaway foods and reducing waste is a step closer towards a greener planet.

Easy Purchase Process: The app's user-friendly interface makes it easy to browse, choose, and purchase Surprise Bags.

Convenient Rescues: Collect your rescued takeaway meal, snack, or groceries at the pre-set time, ensuring a hassle-free takeaway experience.

Join the Too Good To Go Community:

Become a part of a community that believes in eating good food while making a positive impact on the planet. Don't miss out on the opportunity to eat well and do good. Download the app now and start reducing food waste—one tasty Surprise Bag at a time.
trackName: Too Good To Go: End Food Waste
